definition: abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Last year the number of sunspots dropped to a level not seen since the beginning of the 20th century.
sentences.chinese: 去年太陽黑子的數目降至自20世紀初的最低點。

sentences.english: These faculae frequently are the forerunners of sunspot formation .
sentences.chinese: 這些光斑常常是形成太陽黑子的先兆。

sentences.english: The Solar Dynamics Observatory caught sight of the initial explosive flare emanating from a giant group of sunspots.
sentences.chinese: 太陽動態觀察站監測到一片太陽黑子區域發生耀斑。

sentences.english: Secondly, we introduce the measurement theory of vector magnetic field and some optical essentials for the measurement.
sentences.chinese: 第二章詳細地介紹了太陽黑子矢量磁場的測量原理。

sentences.english: The broadcast was snapped for a few seconds by the sunspot activity.
sentences.chinese: 太陽黑子運動使廣播突然中斷了幾秒鐘。

sentences.english: Like sunspots, starspots should change in size and migrate.
sentences.chinese: 像太陽黑子一樣，恆星黑子大小會變會遷移。

sentences.english: The occurrences of dry years were closely related to the sunspot activities.
sentences.chinese: 旱年的發生與太陽黑子活動密切相關。

sentences.english: Sunspots are regions of lower-than- average temperatures that are associated with intense magnetic activity.
sentences.chinese: 太陽黑子是地區低於平均氣溫的相關激烈磁性活動。

sentences.english: Sunspots are caused by irruptions into its surface of the sun's deeper magnetism.
sentences.chinese: 太陽黑子是由入侵活動進入太陽深層磁性表面造成的。

sentences.english: This means -- you guessed it -- sunspots can't exist at all.
sentences.chinese: 這意味着，太陽黑子將不復存在。

sentences.english: The monster spot came into view of Earth-bound telescopes last week.
sentences.chinese: 上星期，人們用地面望遠鏡觀測到了這一太陽黑子羣。
